name: oi4registry
description: A Registry that keeps track of all oi4 compatible members [D[A[Bmessagebus

scripts.buildAllWindows: cd ./OI4-Local-UI & npm run build & cd ../OI4-Cockpit-UI & mingw32-make.exe & cd ../OI4-Service & npm run tsc
scripts.buildAllLinux: cd ./OI4-Local-UI & npm run build & cd ../OI4-Cockpit-UI & make & cd ../OI4-Service & npm run tsc
scripts.installAll: cd ./OI4-Local-UI & npm install & cd ../OI4-Cockpit-UI & npm install & cd ../OI4-Service & npm install

author: Hilscher
